function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement social distancing measures, limit the size of gatherings, and promote hygiene practices.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Revisit green space typologies, prioritize local neighborhood parks, and promote safe usage of green spaces.","category":"Greenery","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of temporary hospital sites","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public education on new road layouts, clear signage, and traffic management measures","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Investment in regular hygiene and vehicle cleaning, development of robust health and safety protocols, promotion of personal hygiene practices among users","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Redesign of streets and infrastructure to accommodate a diverse range of transportation modes, promotion of shared space principles, implementation of traffic management measures","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of cost-effective hygiene and cleaning solutions, investment in technology for contactless operations, partnerships with public health organizations for hygiene standards","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing measures to minimize the risk of contagion on public transit, such as reduced capacity, frequent disinfection, and improved ventilation","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial support for public transit systems, investment in infrastructure and operations, and public awareness campaigns to promote the safety of public transit","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developing strategies to promote the use and safety of public spaces, implementing protocols for assessing and managing public space use","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement crowd management strategies and social distancing measures in public spaces.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regularly update pedestrian models and data analysis with real-time data and pandemic-informed usage patterns.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement strict data privacy regulations and security measures for data collection and storage.","category":"Data protection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure equal access to healthcare resources and provide support for remote work and access to essential services.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure access to protective measures and support for lower income workers, and promote equitable distribution of public health resources.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote inclusive urban design, equitable access to public spaces, and policies that address social and economic inequalities.","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote safe and adaptive use of public spaces, support alternative forms of socialization, and invest in online platforms for economic transactions.","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strategies to attract online customers, offer delivery services, and adapt business models to comply with social distancing guidelines","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote domestic tourism, create attractive local experiences, and support businesses with financial assistance and marketing efforts","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement social distancing measures and crowd control regulations","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Re-educate the public on revised capacity limits, update regulations and guidelines","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adapt cleaning and sanitation protocols, emphasize personal hygiene and cleanliness","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing enhanced ventilation systems and expanding exterior spaces to reduce the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reviewing and updating building codes and laws to align with covid-19 safety recommendations, and implementing additional safety measures in interior spaces.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing interim solutions such as portable air purifiers, physical barriers, and flexible furniture arrangements to adapt interior spaces to the current situation.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct thorough impact assessments and urban planning to account for space requirements and population growth","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement strict data privacy regulations, transparency in surveillance use, and independent oversight of surveillance practices","category":"Data protection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict data protection laws, transparency in data collection and usage.","category":"Data protection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Educational campaigns, protection of individuals’ privacy, anonymous data sharing.","category":"Data protection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Data protection regulations, consent-based data sharing, limited data retention.","category":"Data protection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Education about the benefits of contact tracing, transparent communication about data usage","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"International monitoring and advocacy for human rights, legal challenges to unjust restrictions","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Encourage and facilitate safe and gradual return to public spaces, promote community engagement and social activities.","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Support mental health services and community programs, address economic disparities and provide resources for rebuilding community attachment.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Address systemic inequalities, improve safety measures, and promote inclusive access to public spaces.","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement targeted support programs, improve access to healthcare, and address social and economic disparities","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invest in creating and maintaining green spaces in lower-income neighborhoods, improve accessibility to public recreational areas","category":"Greenery","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure access to safe spaces and support services, increase awareness and monitoring of domestic abuse cases","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement inclusive and community-centered urban policies, provide culturally sensitive public spaces, and address systemic discrimination and inequality.","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deploy community policing initiatives, improve neighborhood infrastructure, and strengthen community empowerment programs.","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promote community-led safety initiatives, enhance transparency in surveillance practices, and reform police tactics and accountability.","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Combat misinformation and stereotypes, promote interfaith dialogue, and implement anti-discrimination laws and policies.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regulating the number of vendors and visitors, implementing physical distancing measures, and providing hygiene facilities","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Providing financial support, access to healthcare services, and opportunities for alternative sources of income","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing regularization programs, providing access to healthcare and social services, and addressing the root causes of migration","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing data collection and regulation strategies, providing support for informal workers","category":"Data protection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developing global-scale regulatory systems, implementing city-level regulations with global implications","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of urban-scale regulations into global decision-making processes, awareness and education on global interconnectedness","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developing adaptable public space designs to accommodate varying impacts","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collaboration of planning and public health professionals in building healthier cities","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
